SEARCH
Package fang2.core

Class Mouse

java.lang.Object
fang2.core.Mouse
All Implemented Interfaces:
Externalizable, Serializable
public class Mouse extends Object implements Externalizable
Stores the mouse positions and clicks for use in the gaming engine.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public String toString()
      returns a string representation of the mouse position
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • setCanvas

      public void setCanvas(AnimationCanvas canvas)
      sets the canvas. The size of the canvas is used to scale the mouse position by the inverse of the canvas size in order to make the positions from (0, 0) to (1, 1). If the canvas is rectangular, it scales from 0 to 1 on the short side and 0 to n on the long side.
      Parameters:
      canvas - the canvas used for scaling the positions of the mouse

    • addListeners

      public void addListeners()

    • writeExternal

      public void writeExternal(ObjectOutput out) throws IOException
      writes the position and clicking of the mouse to the output stream.
      Specified by:
      writeExternal in interface Externalizable
      Parameters:
      out - the output stream to write to
      Throws:
      IOException

    • readExternal

      public void readExternal(ObjectInput in) throws IOException
      reads in the mouse from the input stream.
      Specified by:
      readExternal in interface Externalizable
      Parameters:
      in - the input stream to read from
      Throws:
      IOException

    • clear

      public void clear()
      clear all pending mouse events

    • clearClicks

      public void clearClicks()
      clears all mouse clicks

    • getLocation

      public Location2D getLocation()
      gets the last position of the mouse. Subsequent calls to getMousePosition will return the same position until the mouse moves to a different location.
      Returns:
      the last position of the mouse

    • getClickLocation

      public Location2D getClickLocation()
      determines the last position of a click.
      Returns:
      last clicked position, null if not clicked since last frame advance

    • getLeftClickLocation

      public Location2D getLeftClickLocation()
      determines the last position of a left click
      Returns:
      last clicked position, null if not clicked since last frame advance

    • getMiddleClickLocation

      public Location2D getMiddleClickLocation()
      determines the last position of a middle click.
      Returns:
      last clicked position, null if not clicked since last frame advance

    • getRightClickLocation

      public Location2D getRightClickLocation()
      determines the last position of a right click.
      Returns:
      last clicked position, null if not clicked since last frame advance

    • buttonPressed

      public boolean buttonPressed()
      determines if the mouse is currently pressed. Clicking occurs when the mouse is released.
      Returns:
      true if the mouse is currently down, false otherwise

    • leftPressed

      public boolean leftPressed()
      determines if the mouse is currently pressed. Clicking occurs when the mouse is released.
      Returns:
      true if the mouse is currently down, false otherwise

    • middlePressed

      public boolean middlePressed()
      determines if the mouse is currently pressed. Clicking occurs when the mouse is released.
      Returns:
      true if the mouse is currently down, false otherwise

    • rightPressed

      public boolean rightPressed()
      determines if the mouse is currently pressed. Clicking occurs when the mouse is released.
      Returns:
      true if the mouse is currently down, false otherwise
